title: New India’s, New Inflation Metric
selftext: Came across this(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yV3p6Rs65IU) interesting take on the aspirations of voters now compared to earlier aspirations. What this opinion piece also shows that views can be expressed even without shouting matches!
